items.name: Spring Rolls
items.description: Crispy vegetable-filled rolls served with sweet chili sauce.

items.name: Garlic Bread
items.description: Toasted bread slices topped with garlic butter and herbs.

items.name: Cheese Nachos
items.description: Crispy nachos loaded with melted cheese, jalapenos, and salsa.

items.name: Chicken Wings
items.description: Spicy buffalo wings with blue cheese dip.

items.name: Margherita Pizza
items.description: Classic pizza with fresh tomato sauce, mozzarella, and basil.

items.name: Chicken Burger
items.description: Grilled chicken patty with lettuce, tomato, onion, and mayo in a sesame bun.

items.name: Pasta Alfredo
items.description: Fettuccine pasta in a creamy parmesan sauce with garlic.

items.name: Veggie Stir Fry
items.description: Mixed vegetables stir-fried with soy sauce and tofu.

items.name: Grilled Salmon
items.description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled with lemon herb butter.

items.name: Beef Tacos
items.description: Soft tacos filled with seasoned beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

items.name: Chocolate Cake
items.description: Rich moist chocolate layer cake with fudge frosting.

items.name: Ice Cream Sundae
items.description: Vanilla ice cream topped with chocolate syrup, nuts, and cherry.

items.name: Tiramisu
items.description: Italian dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.

items.name: Fruit Salad
items.description: Fresh seasonal fruits mixed with honey yogurt dressing.
